description:
Buying/ordering over the Internet

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
63931 Information and communication technology (ICT)

Definition:
The phrase "Buying/ordering over the Internet" means the
purchase or ordering of goods and services in return for
payment, with the offer and the purchase or ordering being
made in electronic form or via electronic media (internet).
It is irrelevant whether payment is made in electronic form
and whether the goods or services are delivered
electronically.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2016
name: Buying/ordering over the Internet
